# The `AMDGPURemoveIncompatibleFunctions.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This pass replaces all uses of functions that use GPU features incompatible with the current GPU with null then deletes the function. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This pass replaces all uses of functions that use GPU features incompatible with the current GPU with null then deletes the function.

<SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note: we print the function name as part of the diagnostic because if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// debug info is not present, users get &quot;&lt;unknown&gt;:0:0&quot; as the debug</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses">PreservedAnalyses</a></span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>.isDeclaration())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcnsubtarget">GCNSubtarget</a> &#42;ST =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcnsubtarget">GCNSubtarget</a> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(TM-&gt;getSubtargetImpl(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check the GPU isn&#39;t generic or generic-hsa. Generic is used for testing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// only and we don&#39;t want this pass to interfere with it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> GPUName = ST-&gt;getCPU();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (GPUName.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a2dc80c585ad5882da8cae7b5968f7e74">empty</a>() || GPUName.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a2cd8968ff703aaeb395dcd63f6805ff1">starts&#95;with</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;generic&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try to fetch the GPU&#39;s info. If we can&#39;t, it&#39;s likely an unknown processor</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// so just bail out.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/subtargetsubtypekv">SubtargetSubTypeKV</a> &#42;GPUInfo = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-amdgpuremoveincompatiblefunctions-cpp-/#a96af0c5ce8e7774aa57f540333b5ddaa">getGPUInfo</a>(&#42;ST, GPUName);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!GPUInfo)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get all the features implied by the current GPU, and recursively expand</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the features that imply other features.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// e.g. GFX90A implies FeatureGFX9, and FeatureGFX9 implies a whole set of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// other features.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/featurebitset">FeatureBitset</a> GPUFeatureBits =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-amdgpuremoveincompatiblefunctions-cpp-/#ad69a0ba53c1180dd66530af345bda9cb">expandImpliedFeatures</a>(GPUInfo-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/subtargetsubtypekv/#a81f7413b246b670568e35061dc0b9f0c">Implies</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/featurebitarray/#ac4a0360586ccc1be7d8ec4e824778e1a">getAsBitset</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now that the have a FeatureBitset containing all possible features for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the chosen GPU, check our list of &quot;suspicious&quot; features.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check that the user didn&#39;t enable any features that aren&#39;t part of that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// GPU&#39;s feature set. We only check a predetermined set of features.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Feature : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-amdgpuremoveincompatiblefunctions-cpp-/#ab7f5185220e506ef5ebfc6c6c2d461df">FeaturesToCheck</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ST-&gt;hasFeature(Feature) &amp;&amp; !GPUFeatureBits.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/featurebitset/#a4fce0696a3465a5f24d788288f23f6bf">test</a>(Feature)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-amdgpuremoveincompatiblefunctions-cpp-/#a87374a870efdb5320c2019accfd96e75">reportFunctionRemoved</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>, Feature);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Delete FeatureWavefrontSize32 functions for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// gfx9 and below targets that don&#39;t support the mode.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// gfx10+ is implied to support both wave32 and 64 features.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// They are not in the feature set. So, we need a separate check</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ST-&gt;getGeneration() &lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/amdgpusubtarget/#a53c0ee4138bfbf9e0410a65e0eaa36e2a0a29519a2da61e1cf78d898e26fef446">AMDGPUSubtarget::GFX10</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ST-&gt;hasFeature(AMDGPU::FeatureWavefrontSize32)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-amdgpuremoveincompatiblefunctions-cpp-/#a87374a870efdb5320c2019accfd96e75">reportFunctionRemoved</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>, AMDGPU::FeatureWavefrontSize32);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
